cards.title: C0 VSCode Extension
cards.role: Programmer for Regex/Syntax Highlighting and Color Themes
cards.briefDescription: A VSCode Extension made for 15-122, an introductory CS class at CMU
cards.longDescription: As part of transitioning the 15-122 course to supporting the modern text editor VSCode, a group of TAs worked together to create an extension that enabled autocompletion, syntax highlighting, static type-checking, and more. This helped hundreds of students each semester with learning and coding in the new language C0.

cards.title: Office Hours Queue
cards.description: Adding features to the 15-122 Office Hours queue website
cards.briefDescription: Adding features for remote office hours support to the 15-122 OH queue website
cards.longDescription: This project was done in collaboration with other TAs to add features onto the current 15-122 queue, both in making some general quality-of-life improvements along with addressing some issues with remote office hours. This also had the overarching goal of getting TAs more directly involved with improving the course.

cards.title: osu!
cards.description: Contributor to the open-source, "free-to-win" rhythm game osu!
cards.briefDescription: Added chat-related features to the open-source, "free-to-win" rhythm game osu!
cards.longDescription: As part of the open-source excursion project with 17-313, I worked with a team of 5 students to tackle various issues in the osu! repository. We mainly focused on fixing UI/UX features and bugs with the game's current chat system. After the course, I also worked with a partner to contribute to osu!'s web API.

links.linkPretext: A demo video summarizing the changes we worked on for the course can be found
You can also find the base repository
